title: Monarch butterfly story
brief_description: Portrays the four stages in the life cycle of the Monarch butterfly. Close-up photography depicts the Monarch laying its eggs, and shows the caterpillar eating its way out of the egg, feeding, moulting, forming its chrysalis, and emerging as a butterfly.
